Core:Properties.Core:Property: (\{ "05:47 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Morning Dits :)\\"", "05:48 [VPChat\|Ditto] \\"Morning\\"", "05:48 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"How goes with you?\\"", "23:29 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Hey guys. Brought her out to deal with this whole Guild Meeting malarky. I intend for her to appear.\\"", "23:31 [VPChat\|Ditto] \\"For what guild?\\"", "23:32 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"She's not working with a guild. She's attending as a shadow to see what the hell is going to be occuring and to make sure that it doesn't kick her personal interests too far into the mud.\\"", "23:33 [VPChat\|Ditto] \\"You can certainly try. It might be tricky and you'll have to do some major @roll success\\"", "23:33 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Depends on what alliances I can make beforehand xD\\"", "23:34 [VPChat\|Azrael] \\"Ideally, she'd talk to PCs, and get a PC to find out what's going on and report to her.\\"", "23:34 [VPChat\|Azrael] \\"Since a sneaky VP sneaking around sneakily doesn't create RP for others. But a social VP asking someone else to sneak around gathering information does.\\"", "23:35 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"True. I'll do it in the best way to create RP. You know me, Tony :)\\"", "23:42 [VPChat\|Ditto] \\"YEah. I'm with Az. You won't be allowed in if your not part of the guild council or represetive of a house, church, or constables.\\"", "23:43 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Naturally. Let me see what I can do ICly to garner some information building :)\\"", "23:43 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"I won't just sneak in. That wasn't my intention anyway.\\"", "18:02 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Hai guys\\"", "18:03 [VPChat\|Ditto] \\"What is your goal today?\\"", "18:03 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"To log in and chat with you?\\"", "20:52 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Following up a rumour that someone wanted to talk to the 'Lessa. Making RP, that sorta thing. :)\\"", "16:18 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Checking for messages and the like. Got some politics happening with Docktown stuff. :)\\"", "14:35 [VPChat] \\"Alessa yawns, \\"Hi. Checking messages, seeing if any of my own plans are coming together, that sorta thing. And waking up. xD\\"", "21:43 [VPChat] \\"Alessa waves\\"", "12:31 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"No messages for meee. xD\\"", "21:58 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Nah, it's cool Dits. It is as it is. I'm just having Alessa respond to IC stuff hon :)\\"", "12:47 [VPChat] \\"Alessa wavies!\\"", "12:59 [VPChat\|Ditto] \\"Hello\\"", "12:59 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"How goes, Dits? :)\\"", "12:59 [VPChat\|Ditto] \\"Good, how are you Alessa? I'm going to send you a page.\\"", "13:00 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"I'm good. And feel free :)\\"", "14:16 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"This might take me a while to think up properly. \>..\\"", "14:23 [VPChat\|Ditto] \\"You'll get help from your boss. I'll send a letter later\\"", "14:24 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Oh no, I mean names and what have you. The usual thing for guild setup xD\\"", "14:49 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"I'll be back later. Need to think.\\"", "15:57 [VPChat] \\"Alessa yawns, \\"...Morning.\\"", "18:43 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Rawr?\\"", "18:50 [VPChat] \\"Alessa waves\\"", "00:47 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Hey Az!\\"", "00:47 [VPChat\|Azrael] \\"Hiya\\"", "00:48 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Hey. How likely would it be for me to be able to aquire a giant spider? xD\\"", "00:48 [VPChat\|Azrael] \\"What would you need it for?\\"", "00:49 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"To cause a problem in the sewers so that the players start actually wanting to repair it for a job Alessa was given by the Sailors Guild? It offers the most opportunities I can come up with for RP xD\\"", "00:49 [VPChat\|Azrael] \\"Ah, as some sort of antagonist?\\"", "00:49 [VPChat\|Azrael] \\"Last I checked, fightable NPCs weren't working 100%, but since then Roo says they are working...\\"", "00:50 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Sort of. Kinda hoping we could block up the sewage flow with spider webs \>.\>\\"", "00:50 [VPChat\|Azrael] \\"If there's no rush, I can work on something. Perhaps we can have NPC giant spiders that will spawn in the sewers, and find their way out into the city?\\"", "00:51 [VPChat\|Azrael] \\"Or keep them contained to the sewers, but block it up, as you say...\\"", "00:51 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"Yep!\\"", "00:51 [VPChat\|Azrael] \\"OK. Can't do it immediately - but I wanted to write a fightable NPC, as a way of working on new combat code without updating pc-vs-pc code...\\"", "00:52 [VPChat\|Azrael] \\"So this is a good opportunity :) I might need help with writing descriptions \& emotes, though\\"", "00:52 [VPChat\|Alessa] \\"That I can do\\"" \})
